name: Sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite
name_original: Sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite
description:
Click the bed bugs with your mouse to kill them. Try and keep Deirdre (for that is his name) sane for as long as possible. 

Good luck! 

Game inspired by Jamie Harrison-Grundy (AKA Action Jackson)'s experiences with the endless horror of bed bugs.
